ygData.subject: The mind....of a megolomaniac
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, he liked this robot a lot. You miss the big picture Nightstrike. We did not lose, we have one today, little do the Maximals realise, mwhaa ha ha ha He

Yes, he liked this robot a lot. "You miss the big picture Nightstrike.
We did not lose, we have one today, little do the Maximals realise,
mwhaa ha ha ha" He began to chuckle to himself.
